product.longDescription: Our substitute for QIS™ Formula Mix gomphrena, which is temporarily sold out. Audray Mix is very similar to QIS™ Formula Mix in plant habit and productivity. The color range is slightly different, with the addition of Bicolor Rose (not represented in QIS™ Formula Mix). Mixture includes: Audray White, Bicolor Rose, Pink, and Purple Red. 1 1/2" blooms. Also known as globe amaranth and common globe amaranth. Ht. 18–28". Avg. 12,700 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Productive accent flower for fresh and dried arrangements.

Audray Mix Gomphrena Seed

Product ID:4425.114425

Our substitute for QIS™ Formula Mix gomphrena, which is temporarily sold out. Audray Mix is very similar to QIS™ Formula Mix in plant habit and productivity. The color range is slightly different, with the addition of Bicolor Rose (not represented in QIS™ Formula Mix). Mixture includes: Audray White, Bicolor Rose, Pink, and Purple Red. 1 1/2" blooms. Also known as globe amaranth and common globe amaranth. Ht. 18–28". Avg. 12,700 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.
